comment.author: 92019063@N00
comment._content:
Ah ah !! Finally that long lost secret recipe.

I am French, therefore I need some successful tips from the natives: Is it a true legend that you make the pudding several months before Christmas to let it age on a window sill that faces in the direction of Buckingham Palace in order to attract HRH QE2 good graces ?

comment.author: 36267672@N00
comment._content: Though not an expert, I think part of the idea is to keep "feeding" it with brandy...
